title: Entity changes.
body:
Azir's soldiers need hp and capable of being killed, they are to oppressive in lane and not being able to kill them for some extra gold is annoying as hell. Also jumps (like kats shunpo) should work on them.

Heimers turret health needs lowered, Glass cannon Annie Qs one and it's still there, that to much hp. it should take 2 aas or one ability to break them.
